team.title: Our Team
team.description: We are a young and ambitious team of developers who create innovative web solutions using modern technologies. Our mission is to make the internet more accessible and convenient for users.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: We believe in the power of simple but effective solutions. We develop each project with attention to detail, using best practices and modern technologies such as Next.js, React, and CSS Modules.

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.description: Our technology stack includes Next.js with App Router, React, CSS Modules for styling, and integration with various APIs. We constantly learn new technologies and improve our skills.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you have questions or suggestions, don't hesitate to contact us. We are always open to new ideas and collaboration.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, but the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
